page.title: 12HOUSING SURVEY IN CHEADLE.
page.content: IN OUR SURVEY ON HOUSING IN CHEADLE VILLAGE WE FOUND-: 1 THE KIND OF ACCOMODATION PEOPLE LIVED IN: 6O% SEMI-DETACHED, 3O% DETACHED AND 1O% TERRACED. 2 THE AGES OF THE HOUSES WERE 5O% BUILT BETWEEN 192O-1945,AND 5O% BUILT BETWEEN 1945-7O. 3 THE NUMBER OF RESIDENCES SITUATED ON A MAIN ROAD WERE 4O%, CUL-DE-SAC 3O%,GROVE 2O%,CRESCENT 1O% AND ESTATE 1O%. 4 5O%OF THE HOUSES IN CHEADLE WERE HEATED BY GAS AND 5O% BY ELECTRICITY. 5 THE AVERAGE FAMILY CONSISTS OF 2 ADULTS AND 2 CHILDREN. 6 THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF YEARS PEOPLE LIVE IN THIS AREA IS 13 YEARS. 7 1OO% OF THE PEOPLE QUESTIONED LIKED THE AREA THEY LIVE IN. PEOPLE LIKE THIS AREA BECAUSE IT IS CLOSE TO THE COUNTRYSIDE AND SHOPS.
